all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Go ye into all the world, preach the gospel to every creature, acting in the authority which I have given you, baptizing in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost.
Doctrine and Covenants 68:8
Quote of the Day
"Please learn and receive strength from the faith and testimonies of those who came before you."
Elder Hans T. Boom | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
